name: ùêìùêûùê±ùê≠ Uploader
description: Download videos from various websites using this Telegram bot that allows you to extract videos and media files.

API_ID.description: Enter your API id. You can generate it by visiting https://my.telegram.org/auth. This is required to connect to the Telegram API.

API_HASH.description: Enter your API Hash. You can generate it by visiting https://my.telegram.org/auth. This is also required for Telegram API access.

BOT_TOKEN.description: Enter your bot token, which can be obtained by talking to @BotFather on Telegram. This token is used to authenticate your bot with Telegram servers.

OWNER_ID.description: Enter your Telegram user ID. This will give you administrative access to the bot. You can obtain your user ID using the @userinfobot on Telegram.

SUDO_USERS.description: Enter a comma-separated list of Telegram user IDs who should have superuser privileges for managing the bot. For example: '123456789,987654321'.

DOWNLOAD_PATH.description: Specify the download path where the bot will store temporary files. This is optional and defaults to '/tmp/' on Heroku.
